item.description:
Join those who prefer to meetup earlier or are unable to meetup at the regular time tonight for whatever reason! Walk, jog, run or train for the C25K! I will have my timer and whistle. We'll wait about 5-8 minutes for late arrivals before we begin. Please note I may not be online Monday. If Julie cancels the 6:30 session then this will be cancelled as well.

On to week 3!
Remember to bring your sneakers and some water!


If you are looking get in some time to walk, want to train with us, or are runner of your own, please join us. We are normally at the track @ 6:30pm every and any Monday and Wednesday night at BHS.

http://www.coolrunnin...


Couch to 5K, Week 3 Plan:
(3x during the week)
Brisk five-minute warmup walk.
Two repetitions of:
Jog 90 seconds (1/2 lap)
Walk 90 seconds (1/2 lap)
Jog 3 minutes (1 lap)
Walk 3 minutes (1 lap)

Don't worry, I'll bring the stop watch with the whistle so everyone knows when to start and stop the jogging.

Monday, May 10th
5pm
Braintree High School
Track
Meet at the entrance by the bleachers

Organizer(s): Angela

Min/Max: none

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by NOON on Monday, May 10th

Inclement Weather: Heavy rains will cancel. We will train if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle. Please plan to bring a lightweight jacket with a hood just in case. (We will do our best to notify everyone if this event is canceled by 2pm on the day of the training.)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Directions: Please see “Directions to Frequently Used Venues” Discussion Thread on the Message Board.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Track Time For "Early Birds"
